column1: Little Goat Diner////Next we had the pork belly pancake
column3: except for the pork belly part.  The fluffy scallion pancake is full of flavor and holds up well to the very dressed sweet-tangy slaw on top of it.  The pork belly was a big slab of salty soft meat
column4: but the flavors in it were lacking.  Just salty and soft.
